arts.ttl: Van der Heyden and Amoura trade blows as Wolfsburg and St. Pauli share spoils
arts.sum: Siebe Van der Heyden's first-half header for the visitors was cancelled out by Mohamed Amoura's second-half penalty, leaving both teams to settle for a point in a closely contested match. Mohamed Amoura calmly slots home the equalising penalty for VfL Wolfsburg, bringing the scores level in the second half - Ronny Hartmann

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs. St. Pauli Preview: Two different objectives to play for at Volkswagen Arena
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg (10-7-7, 7th) host FC St. Pauli (6-3-15, 15th) at the Volkswagen Arena on Saturday afternoon, with the two sides in completely opposite situations.

These two teams are enjoying differing fortunes, and it's another Northern derby for Wolfsburg who eased past Bremen last weekend. 2.Bundesliga champions St. Pauli have failed to score in a club reco...
